Service Details: - Offers 20 bed residential bed intensive substance abuse treatment program six weeks in duration- Program is highly structured and intensive, person centered, offered in a safe, substance free, live-in environment, begins with comprehensive intake assessment, focuses on practicing skills to deal with issues, and addresses mental health and substance use issues simultaneously
Eligibility: Ages: 19 year(s) and up- Participants must be referred by an approved referral source- An Interior Health practitioner will then screen the application to determine a person's eligibility
